convert_from_bytes(
    pdf_file,
    dpi=200,
    output_folder=None,
    first_page=None,
    last_page=None,
    fmt='ppm',
    jpegopt=None,
    thread_count=1,
    userpw=None,
    use_cropbox=False,
    strict=False,
    transparent=False,
    single_file=False,
    output_file=str(uuid.uuid4()),
    poppler_path=None,
    grayscale=False,
    size=None,
    paths_only=False,
    use_pdftocairo=False,
    timeout=600
 )
